content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The service interruption notification (SIN) should be created in cases when the IT service operation is disrupted or broken; when a service breakdown or considerable drop-down of productivity take place; or in cases of the planned stoppage of services. The support portal provides a possibility to create SINs starting from the second phase of the incident lifecycle (categorization): \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/9176d52a-4e4a-4118-b8e4-1acdeba2165d/image2016-9-2%2010:53:3.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":623,\"height\":146}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For more information about SIN processing please refer to the\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://pal.epam.com/pal_method_plugin/guidances/whitepapers/doc_WIIT_ServiceInterruptNotification_52AFFD7C.html?nodeId=361fec8a\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Service Interrupt Notification Working Instruction\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
